title: EcoTrain Training Dataset
description: EcoTrain is a geospatial training dataset of Ecosystem Functional Groups (EFGs) as defined in the IUCN Global Ecosystem Typology (GET). Each feature represents a single labeled training sample with associated spatial, temporal, methodological, and interpretative metadata. The dataset is provided as GeoJSON vector assets with multiple spatial supports (point, 10m, and 100m polygons) and is designed for Earth observation analysis, spatial modelling, and machine learning workflows.
keywords: International Union for Conservation of Nature

points.title: EcoTrain point-based training samples
points.description: Point geometries representing the reference GPS location of each EcoTrain training sample.

polygons-10m.title: EcoTrain 10 m polygon training samples
polygons-10m.description: Square polygon geometries (10m x 10m) centred on the reference GPS location of each EcoTrain training sample.

polygons-100m.title: EcoTrain 100 m polygon training samples
polygons-100m.description: Square polygon geometries (100m x 100m) centred on the reference GPS location of each EcoTrain training sample.
